SEARCH
Package raytracer.math

Class Point

java.lang.Object
raytracer.math.AbstractVec3
raytracer.math.Point
public final class Point extends AbstractVec3
3D point (position). Immutable. Supports translation by vectors and difference between points as a vector.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class raytracer.math.AbstractVec3
